alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 3:54AM PDT until April 12 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...East Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys
